column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

オートマンは
すでに立ち去った後だ。
column5: You missed them. The Automen have already left.
column11: You missed them, the Automen have already left.

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

やつら、
街をこんなにしやがった。
column5: This is what they've done to the town.
column11: This is what they've done to the town.

column4:
このトーテムが起動すると
周囲のマリオネーションギアは
操縦不能になる。
column5: Once these totems are activated, any Marionation Gear in the area will stop working.
column11: Once these totems are activated, any Marionation Gear in the area become inoperable.

column4:
これだけの数が作動したら、
手がつけられない。
column5: If this many of them get up and running, the whole situation will spiral out of control.
column11: If this number of them are able to get up and running, the whole situation will fall out of our hands.

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

幸い、まだ作動しては
いないようだ。
column5: Fortunately, these don't seem to be working yet.
column11: Fortunately, these don't seem to working yet.

column4:
なら、今のうちに
全部壊そう！
column5: Then now's our chance to destroy them all!
column11: Then, now's our chance to destroy them all!

column4:
しかし、これだけの数。
そう簡単には……。
column5: But with this many of them, that's easier said than done...
column11:
However, there are a number of them.
This won't be a walk in the park...

column4:
私のドライビング・テクニック
を見せる時がきたようですね。
column5: It appears the time has come for me to show off my driving techniques.
column11: It appears the time has come for me to show off my driving techniques.

column4:
速度の速いマシンを使い、
体当たりでトーテムを
壊しましょう。
column5: Let's destroy these totems by hitting them at high speeds with fast vehicles.
column11: Let's destroy these totems by hitting them at high speeds with a fast mech.

column4: メリッサ＿戦闘中電話機で通話

大変だよ！
街がオートマンに襲われてる！
急いで戻ろう！
column5:
This is bad!
Automen are attacking the town!
We need to hurry back!
column11:
It's bad!
Automen are attacking town!
We need to hurry back!
